name: BaseCEDSResource
label: Base CEDS Resource
comment:
The BaseCEDSResource class represents the base resource in the Common Education Data Standards (CEDS) ontology. 
			It serves as the foundational class from which all other CEDS resource classes inherit common properties and attributes.
			Subclasses of BaseCEDSResource may include specific types of instructional resources, such as students, staff, courses, 
			assessments, etc.

name: RecordStatus
label: Record Status
comment: TBD

name: RecordStatusHistory
label: Record Status History
comment: TBD

name: DataCollection
label: Data Collection
comment: TBD

name: C200393
label: Accrediting Organization
comment: An authority that reviews an organization's educational program and staff for quality, and certifies whether the organization meets a minimal set of standards.

name: C200001
label: Activity
comment: An organized activity, such as a co-curricular or extra-curricular activity that is offered at an education institution.

name: C200002
label: Activity Recognition
comment: Records of a person's participation in an organized activity, such as a co-curricular or extra-curricular activity that is offered at an education institution.

name: C200003
label: Adult Education Course
comment: Information about a Course specific to adult education.

name: C200004
label: Adult Education Provider
comment: Information about an organization specific to their role as an adult education provider.

name: C200005
label: Adult Education Staff
comment: Information about a person specific to their role as a staff member in an adult education context.

name: C200006
label: Adult Education Student Academic Record
comment: Information in a student's academic record specific to adult education program participation.

name: C200007
label: Adult Education Student Employment
comment: Information about student employment specific to the adult education context.

name: C200392
label: Affiliated Institution
comment: An institution that has an ongoing, functional relationship with the education institution in order to provide improved educational experiences to an individual and/or the school.

name: C200008
label: Apip Interaction
comment: Information defining an assessment item interaction that may be specified using the IMS Global Accessible Portable Item Protocol APIP(R) standards.

name: C200009
label: Application
comment: Information about a software application used for authentication and access.

name: C200010
label: Assessment
comment: An instrument used to evaluate a person typically having at-least one AssessmentForm, AssessmentSection, and AssessmentItem.

name: C200012
label: Assessment Accommodation
comment: Information defining a variation in the standard administration of a standardized assessment that may be avaibale to accomodate a special needs such as a physical or cognitive disability.

name: C200013
label: Assessment Administration
comment: Information for an assessment event or administration period.

name: C200015
label: Assessment Asset
comment: Information about content used to compose an Assessment Item, is referenced by an item but not part of the item content itself, or is content that is included as part of a section within an assessment form. Assets can be static content such as artwork or dynamic assets such as calculators or other tools.

name: C200016
label: Assessment Early Learning Developmental Domain
comment: Developmental domains related to early learning and used for assessing a child's kindergarten readiness.

name: C200017
label: Assessment Form
comment: An instance of an a sessment that can equate scores with another instance of that same assessment.

name: C200019
label: Assessment Form Assessment Form Section
comment: Information linking sections within an assessment form to the form and the order in which the sections are designed to be offered.

name: C200020
label: Assessment Form Section
comment: Information about a grouping of assessment items intended to be delivered together.

name: C200022
label: Assessment Form Section Assessment Item
comment: Information linking assessment items to an assessment form section.

name: C200023
label: Assessment Item
comment: A specific prompt that defines a question or protocol for a measurable activity that triggers a response from a person used to determine whether the person has mastered a learning objective.

name: C200024
label: Assessment Item Apip
comment: Accessible Portable Item Protocol information for an assessment item that may use the IMS Global APIP(R) standards.

name: C200025
label: Assessment Item Apip Description
comment: Accessible Portable Item Protocol description for an assessment item that may use the IMS Global APIP(R) standards.

name: C200026
label: Assessment Item Characteristic
comment: The type and value for a psychometric measure.

name: C200027
label: Assessment Item Possible Response
comment: Information about one of the possible responses that a person may give in response to an assessment item prompt.

name: C200028
label: Assessment Item Response
comment: AssessmentItemResponse includes information about a learner response and subsequent information about feedback and scoring of the response.  Some properties like DescriptiveFeedback are for support of a  formative assessment process. Some properties are used within intelligent tutoring systems such as HintCount and ScaffoldingItemFlag.

name: C200029
label: Assessment Item Response Theory
comment: Information representing the difficulty of an assessment itme and other measures of the relationship between any individuals' performances on the test item and the test takers' levels of performance on an overall measure of the ability that item was designed to measure.

name: C200030
label: Assessment Item Rubric Criterion Result
comment: Information about an assessment result or score derived using a rubic criterion.

name: C200031
label: Assessment Language
comment: The association of an Assessment to one or more languages.

name: C200032
label: Assessment Need Apip Content
comment: Used as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the content preferences and representation.

name: C200033
label: Assessment Need Apip Control
comment: Used as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the control attributes.

name: C200034
label: Assessment Need Apip Display
comment: Used as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile to define the display attributes.

name: C200035
label: Assessment Need Braille
comment: Defines as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile the attributes for Braille display

name: C200036
label: Assessment Need Screen Enhancement
comment: Defines as part of an Assessment Personal Needs Profile the attributes for screen enhancement.

name: C200037
label: Assessment Participant Session
comment: Information about a specific person's participation in an Assessment Session.

name: C200038
label: Assessment Performance Level
comment:
information about the performance levels that may be assigned to an Assessment Subtest Result and specifications for selecting the performance level based on a score. Four styles are supported:
1) specification of performance level by lower and upper cut score,
2) specification of performance level by lower cut score only,
3) specification of performance level without any mapping to scores, and
4) Specification of performance level by mapping to other scores.

name: C200039
label: Assessment Personal Need Language Learner
comment: Information that indicates a person's need related as a language learner that may be used to deternine the need for an assessment accomodation.

name: C200040
label: Assessment Personal Need Screen Reader
comment: Information that indicates a person's need that calls for use of a screen reader accomodation during assessment.

name: C200041
label: Assessment Personal Needs Profile
comment: An entity that includes information about the personal needs and preferences for assessment participants, based on the IMS Global (R) Accessible Portable Item Protocol (R)

name: C200042
label: Assessment Personal Needs Profile Content
comment: An entity that includes information about the personal needs and preferences related to content presented within an assessment delivery.

name: C200043
label: Assessment Personal Needs Profile Control
comment: An entity that includes information about the personal needs and preferences related to control of presentation during delivery of assessments.

name: C200044
label: Assessment Personal Needs Profile Display
comment: An entity that includes information about the personal needs and preferences related to displays of assessment content.

name: C200045
label: Assessment Personal Needs Profile Screen Enhancement
comment: An entity that includes information about the personal needs and preferences related to screen enhancements during delivery of an assessment.

name: C200046
label: Assessment Registration
comment: Information related to a specific person registered for an Assessment Administration, assigned a specific  Assessment Form for participation in one or more Assessment Sessions.

name: C200047
label: Assessment Result
comment: An entity that includes information about a person's results from an assessment which may be for the entire assessment or one aspect of evaluation. The scoring method is defined by the related Assessment Subtest. The entity includes the score value and information about the score, such as a diagnostic statement.

name: C200048
label: Assessment Result Rubric Criterion Result
comment: This join links an assessment result record to a result defined within a RubricCriterion.

name: C200049
label: Assessment Session
comment: Information related to an instance of delivering an assessment during a specific period of time.

name: C200050
label: Assessment Session Staff Role
comment: Roles served related to the administration of an assessment session.

name: C200051
label: Assessment Subtest
comment: Information for scoring an Assessment Form based on a set of Assessment Item responses with explicit rules to produce an Assessment Subtest Result, which may be for the entire Assessment Form or one aspect of evaluation based on a subset of Assessment Items.

name: C200052
label: Assessment Subtest Assessment Item
comment: This join links an assessment subtest to an assessment item.

name: C200053
label: Assessment Subtest Early Learning Developmental Domain
comment: This join links an assessment subtest to an early learning developmental domain record.

name: C200054
label: Authentication
comment: An application or service that can authenticate the identity of a person. The CEDS entity that includes information about an authentication provider, the login identifier used to authenticate a person's identity, and other information related to authentication of a person's identity.

name: C200055
label: Authorization
comment: Information about a data system or application which an authenticated person may access.

name: C200056
label: Authorization Document
comment: Information about a document that authorizes a deision or plan such as a document authorizing an IEP.

name: C200057
label: Board Membership
comment: Information related to persons as board members within an organization.

name: C200058
label: Building Space
comment: Information describing and defining the uses of space within a building.

name: C200059
label: Building Space Utilization
comment: Information about the capacity and assigned utilization of an area within a building including if the area is unassigned.

name: C200060
label: Building System Category
comment: Type of building within a school such as a playground, gym, or classroom.

name: C200061
label: Building System Component
comment: Information about a component of a system within a facility including the installation date, lifecycle cost, description, and useful life.

name: C200062
label: Building System Component Service
comment: Information that tracks the service record of a building system component.

name: C200069
label: Campus
comment: A location where the postsecondary institution provides services (admin, residential, education). May be virtual or physical. May be called by other terms (e.g., branch, location site regional campus).

name: C200090
label: Career And Technical Course
comment: The organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis, usually for a predetermined period of time (e.g., a semester or two-week workshop) to an individual or group of students (e.g., a class).

name: C200091
label: Career And Technical Student Academic Record
comment: Summary academic record information for a career and technical education student.

name: C200021
label: Charter School Authorizing Organization
comment: An organization responsible for authorizing charter schools.

name: C200379
label: Charter School Management Organization
comment: A separate legal entity that 1) contracts with one or more charter schools to manage, operate, and oversee the charter schools; or 2) holds a charter, or charters, to operate multiple charter schools. (see Charter School Management Organization Type)

name: C200063
label: Classroom
comment: A room where educational services are provided by a school, school system, state, or other agency or entity.

name: C200065
label: Competency Definition
comment: A resource that states a capability or behavior that a person may learn or be able to do within a given context with references to potential levels of competence, a mastery threshold, and other contextualizing metadata.

name: C200064
label: Competency Definition Association
comment: The relation of competency definitions to other competency definitions and/or competency frameworks to competency frameworks to support competency maps or competency sub frameworks or linked controlled vocabulary terms as metadata to further define a competency definition. (In CEDS IDS CompetencyDefAssociation also provides a mechanism to link any other object in the model to a CompetencyDefinition, e.g. to RubricCriterion, LearningResource, Course, or AssessmentItem.)

name: C200067
label: Competency Framework
comment: A resource that identifies a collection of logically related CompetencyDefinitions, CompetencyDefAssociations, and contextualizing metadata.

name: C200068
label: Competency Set
comment: CompetencySet supports defining criteria for award or recognition of a credential or micro-credential based on a person's attainment of one or more CompetencyFrameworkItem(s). The set may have a completion criteria specifying if all or some of the items are required. If only some are required  then Completion Criteria Threshold is used to specify how many. Competency Set may also include other Competency Sets so it is possible to make a rule such as "the person must complete these three required competency items and 2 out of 3 of these items specified in this sub set."

name: C200071
label: Core Knowledge Area
comment: The core knowledge areas addressed by a professional development activity most commonly used in the early learning domain.

name: C001209
label: County A N S I Code
comment: County code as defined for the identification of counties and equivalent areas of the United States, Puerto Rico, and the insular areas as established by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI) Inter-National Committee for Information Technology Standards (INCITS) in specification BSR INCITS 31-200x or more current updates. See https://www.census.gov/library/reference/code-lists/ansi.html#par_statelist.

name: C200072
label: Course
comment: The organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis, usually for a predetermined period of time.

name: C200073
label: Course Funding Source
comment: The relationship between course and the financial account that would be used to fund the course.

name: C200074
label: Course Section
comment: CourseSection represents an instance of a course offered/delivered in a specific timeframe and/or place or through specific media or mode of study or to a specific section of students. (In the CEDS IDS, CourseSection is a subclass of organization that can be linked to persons and roles using Membership. Subclasses include K12 Course, PsCourse, CteCoure, AeCourse)

name: C200075
label: Course Section Assessment Reporting
comment: The method(s) that the instructor of the course uses to report the performance and achievement of all students. It may be a qualitative method such as individualized teacher comments or a quantitative method such as a letter or a numerical grade.

name: C200076
label: Course Section Level
comment: Information about an education level associated with a Course Section.

name: C200077
label: Course Section Location
comment: The location where a Course Section meets.

name: C200078
label: Course Section Schedule
comment: CourseSectionSchedule contains the times and days that a class is scheduled to meet on a weekly basis.

name: C200079
label: Credential Award
comment: Information about the award of a credential to a person or organization.

name: C200080
label: Credential Award Credit
comment: Credential AwardCredit may be used to record a specific course instance(CousreSection) that a Person completed to qualify for a CredentialAward using MembershipId and/or it could use CredentialCriteriaCourseId to reference the course completed.

name: C200081
label: Credential Award Evidence
comment: CredentialAwardEvidence includes a statement or reference describing the evidence that the learner met the criteria for attainment of the achievement and may be related to an AssessmentResult.

name: C200082
label: Credential Award Relationship
comment: The relationship between two credential awards, genrally used to capture extentions to an award (e.g., An endorsement for a teaching license).

name: C200087
label: Credential Definition
comment: Defines a qualification, achievement, personal or organizational quality, or aspect of an identity typically used to indicate suitability.

name: C200083
label: Credential Definition Agent
comment: Information linking a person or organization to a credential definition with the applicable role such as the author, publisher, or issuer or the credential.

name: C200084
label: Credential Definition Category
comment: Information about a category defined within a specified category system that is applicable to a credential.

name: C200085
label: Credential Definition Criteria
comment: Defines the criteria by which a credential may be issued.

name: C200086
label: Credential Definition Identifier
comment: Defines one or more identifiers for a credential defininition.

name: C200391
label: Credentialing Organization
comment: An institution, organization, federation, or other such group that is responsible for accrediting or endorsing an individual's preparation, skills, or performance.

name: C200088
label: Credential Issuer
comment: An organization or person that issues a credential.

name: C200089
label: Credential Offered
comment: Links a CredentialIssuer to a CredentialDefinition defining a credential offered by that entity.

name: C200066
label: Early College
comment: An institution in which all students participate in a comprehensive plan that integrates their high school course of study and an intentionally designed authentic postsecondary experience leading to their regular high school diploma, an official college transcript and transferable college credit towards a recognized postsecondary degree or credential.

name: C200094
label: Early Learning Child Demographic
comment: Person demographics properties specific to the early learning context.

name: C200095
label: Early Learning Child Developmental Assessment
comment: Information about an assessment used in the context of early learning.

name: C200096
label: Early Learning Child Health
comment: Person health properties specific to the early learning context.

name: C200097
label: Early Learning Child Individualized Program
comment: Individualized program properties specific to the early learning context.

name: C200098
label: Early Learning Child Outcome Summary
comment: The Child Outcomes Summary (COS) process is a way for states to measure the progress of preschool and pre-K students receiving IEP services.

name: C200099
label: Early Learning Child Program Eligibility
comment: Information about a child's eligibility status for services under vaious programs.

name: C200100
label: Early Learning Child Service
comment: Information about services offered and services received through early learning programs.

name: C200101
label: Early Learning Child Services Application
comment: Information about the application process for earliy learning services.

name: C200102
label: Early Learning Child Transition Plan
comment: Information about transitions plans and compliance events for children transitioning from IDEA part C to IDEA part B.

name: C200103
label: Early Learning Class Section
comment: A cohort of children receiving services together, or in some cases individually, usually for a predetermined amount of time, with at least one assigned primary teacher.

name: C200104
label: Early Learning Class Section Service
comment: The services provided in an early leaning class/section.

name: C200105
label: Early Learning Course
comment: The organization of early learning subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of children on a regular or systematic basis, usually for a predetermined period of time (e.g., a semester or two-week workshop) to an individual or group of children (e.g., a class or group).  This further defines course at the domain level.

name: C200092
label: Early Learning Credential
comment: The credential related to early childhood education or development held by a person.

name: C200106
label: Early Learning Enrollment
comment: Enrollment of early learners in a program, class, or section.

name: C200107
label: Early Learning Enrollment Other Funding
comment: Information about tyes of funding applied to a specific child recieving early learning services.

name: C200108
label: Early Learning Facility Licensing
comment: The status and attributes of the facility license for an early learning organization.

name: C200110
label: Early Learning Organization
comment: Properties of an organization specific to the early learning domain that are combined with general Organization properties.

name: C200111
label: Early Learning Organization Availability
comment: Information on the early learning organization's availability to include time, groups served, facilities, and environment.

name: C200112
label: Early Learning Organization Funds
comment: Information about sources of funds received by an early learning organization.

name: C200113
label: Early Learning Organization Monitoring
comment: Information about events such as site visits by which an early learning organization is monitored, such as for compliance.

name: C200114
label: Early Learning Organization Student Responsibility
comment: The responsibility of an early learning organization to a student.

name: C200115
label: Early Learning Program Licensing
comment: The status and attributes of the licensing for an early learning program.

name: C200093
label: Early Learning Program Type Offered
comment: The type(s) of  early childhood programs offered.

name: C200116
label: Early Learning Quality Initiative
comment: Information about participation and scoring of quality retings for an early learning organization.

name: C200117
label: Early Learning Quality Rating Improvement
comment: The early learning organization's Quality Rating and Improvement System (QRIS) attributes.

name: C200118
label: Early Learning Service Partner
comment: Information about a service partner to an early learning organization.

name: C200119
label: Early Learning Staff
comment: Early learning staff attributes.

name: C200120
label: Early Learning Staff Assignment
comment: Information about a role to which an early learning staff member has been assigned.

name: C200121
label: Early Learning Staff Education
comment: Early childhood credentials and education credits held by an early learning staff member.

name: C200122
label: Early Learning Staff Employment
comment: Attributes for early learning staff employment.  Extends from Staff.

name: C200390
label: Education Institution
comment: A public or private institution, organization, or agency that provides instructional or support services to students or staff at any level.

name: C200389
label: Education Organization Network
comment: A self-organized membership network of peer-level educational organizations intended to provide shared services or collective procurement.

name: C200109
label: Eligibility Evaluation
comment: Information about an event used to determine a learner's eligibility to participate in a program or recieve services.

name: C200227
label: Emergency Response Agency
comment: The local, state, or federal agency that has primary responsibility for responding to an emergency situation.

name: C200388
label: Employee Benefit Carrier
comment: An organization or institution that administers benefit plans or services to a staff member.

name: C200387
label: Employee Benefit Contributor
comment: An individual or organization that contributes monetary, in kind, or other types of contributions to an employee's benefit plan.

name: C200386
label: Employer
comment: A business, firm, institution, or other organization for whom an individual works (including self-employment) in return for financial or other compensation.

name: C200123
label: Facility
comment: Information about a piece of land, a building site, a building, or part of a building owned by and/or used for activities of an organizational unit such as a school, school system, program, or institution.

name: C200124
label: Facility Audit
comment: Process that assesses the safety, quality, and utilization of a facility or building.

name: C200125
label: Facility Compliance
comment: Designation that assesses whether a facility or building meets safety and teaching standards set by the school district, state, and federal agencies.

name: C200126
label: Facility Design
comment: Layout of a facility or asset space.

name: C200127
label: Facility Design Construction
comment: Information about the construction of a facility or asset space.

name: C200128
label: Facility Energy
comment: Information about energy consumption of a facility.

name: C200129
label: Facility Finance
comment: Information about a facility's financial condition or status including replacement value, allowed indeptedness amount, insurance deductable, and public education mill rate if applicable.

name: C200130
label: Facility Financial
comment: Information about mortgage and lease costs of a facility.

name: C200131
label: Facility Hazard
comment: Information about hazardous conditions or materials at or near a facility.

name: C200132
label: Facility Joint Use
comment: How a facility is used by parties aside from a primary tenant such as school district.

name: C200133
label: Facility Lease
comment: An agreement of lending a capital asset.

name: C200134
label: Facility Management
comment: Way in which a facility is managed.

name: C200135
label: Facility Management Plan
comment: Information describing a financial management plan and metadata about the applicable types of plans.

name: C200136
label: Facility Mandate
comment: Defines types of mandates applicable to a facility.

name: C200137
label: Facility Mortgage
comment: Defines details about a mortgage of a facility including interest, total asset value, and type of mortgage.

name: C200138
label: Facility Mortgage Fee
comment: Defines the types of fees applicable to a facility mortgage.

name: C200139
label: Facility School Design
comment: Defines a type of school design applicable to a facility.

name: C200140
label: Facility Site
comment: Information about a site at which a facility exists.

name: C200141
label: Facility Utilization
comment: The ratio in which a facility is being utilized by the school district.

name: C000547
label: Federal Program Code
comment: The unique five-digit number assigned to each federal program as listed in the Assistance Listings. See https://sam.gov/content/assistance-listings

name: C200142
label: Financial Account
comment: Summary of financial transations that provides information to external financial statement users.

name: C200143
label: Financial Account Program
comment: The statutes and regulations regarding school accounting and how they differ from state to state.

name: C200144
label: Financial Aid Application
comment: An application for financial aid submitted by a current or prospective student/learner.

name: C200145
label: Financial Aid Award
comment: An award of financial aid for a student/learner.

name: C200146
label: Goal
comment: An entity that includes information about a goal set for a person or organization.

name: C200147
label: Goal Measurement
comment: Information that defines how a goal is to be measured. This may be included in a performance plan, learning plan or IEP.

name: C200148
label: Goal Measurement Criterion
comment: Information about a threshold or rule used with a measurement to determine if a goal has been reached. This may be included in a performance plan, learning plan or IEP.

name: C200149
label: Goal Performance
comment: Status at a point in time toward reaching a  specific planned goal. These detailed records may be included in a progress report, such as a progress report for an IEP.

name: C200385
label: Governing Board
comment: An institution that is responsible for the policy decisions of an educational entity.

name: C200000
label: Grade Level
comment: Grade levels offered by educational institutions.

name: C200150
label: IDEAEligibility Evaluation Category
comment: A category by which a learner's eligibility for participation in an IDEA program may be considered.

name: C200384
label: IDEA Part C Lead Agency
comment: The lead agency within a State/Jurisdiction responsible for administering IDEA Part C.

name: C200151
label: IEP Authorization
comment: Information about whether an evaluation has determined if a person is authorized to receive an IEP.

name: C200152
label: IEP Authorization Rejected
comment: Information about a case in which a student was authorized for an IEP but the IEP was rejected by a parent or legal guardian.

name: C200153
label: IEP Present Level
comment: A level of ability or performance used as a baseline in an IEP. These detailed records may be included in a progress report, such as a progress report for an IEP.

name: C200154
label: Incident
comment: The details for an incident involving a student or school.

name: C200155
label: Incident Activity
comment: Information about the activity or activies taking place during an incident.

name: C200156
label: Incident Person
comment: The relationship between a person and an Incident involving a student or school.

name: C200157
label: Individualized Program
comment: Information on the type, design, dates, and participation of a student in an individualized program.

name: C200158
label: Individualized Program Accessible Format
comment: Information about accessible formats provided to students as part of an individualized program.

name: C200159
label: Individualized Program Accommodation
comment: Information about an accomodation specified as part of an individualized program such as a screen reader or spoken instructions for a visually impaired student.

name: C200160
label: Individualized Program Accommodation Subject
comment: Specifies an academic subject for which an individualized program accomodation applies.

name: C200161
label: Individualized Program Amendment
comment: Information about the ammendment of an individualized program.

name: C200162
label: Individualized Program Assessment
comment: Information about assessment for a student under an individualized program.

name: C200163
label: Individualized Program Assessment Accommodation
comment: Information about an accomotation specified as part of an individualized program that specifically addresses the context of an assessment taken by the student such as a screen reader or spoken instructions for a visually impaired student.

name: C200164
label: Individualized Program Eligibility
comment: Information that defines the eligibility of a student to recieve indivudualized program services or accomodations such as through and IEP or 504 plan.

name: C200165
label: Individualized Program Eligibility Evaluation
comment: Information that defines an assessment of a student's eligibility to recieve indivudualized program services or accomodations such as through and IEP or 504 plan.

name: C200166
label: Individualized Program Goal
comment: Information about a goal set for a student within a indivudualized program or education plan.

name: C200167
label: Individualized Program Meeting
comment: Information that documents a meeting about a student related to a indivudualized program or education plan.

name: C200168
label: Individualized Program Meeting Attendee
comment: Information that documents the attendees at a meeting about a student related to a indivudualized program or education plan.

name: C200169
label: Individualized Program Progress Goal
comment: Links a detailed GoalPerformance record to the progress report, such as for an IEP.

name: C200170
label: Individualized Program Progress Report
comment: An instance of a progress report for an individualized program, such as an IEP.

name: C200171
label: Individualized Program Progress Report Plan
comment: Defines frequency and type of progress reporting specified in the plan as required in an IEP.

name: C200172
label: Individualized Program Service
comment: Information that defines a service that may be delivered to a student through an individualized program.

name: C200173
label: Individualized Program Services Received
comment: Relationship between services received  and one or more individualized programs.

name: C200383
label: Intermediate Educational Unit
comment: A regional, multi-services public agency authorized by State law to develop, manage, and provide services, programs, or other support (e.g., construction, food services, technology services) to LEAs.

name: C200174
label: IPEDS Finance
comment: Information related to the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System requirements for postsecondary financial data reporting.

name: C200175
label: Job
comment: An entity that represent any type of job.

name: C200176
label: Job Competency
comment: The relationship between a job and the competency or competencies required for that job.

name: C200177
label: Job Credential
comment: The relationship between a job and credential or credentials required for that job.

name: C200178
label: Job Detail
comment: Information about a job.

name: C200179
label: Job Identifier
comment: A unique number or alphanumeric code used to identify a job.

name: C200180
label: Job Position
comment: An entity that represents any type of job position. A job position represents an instance of a job.

name: C200181
label: Job Position Detail
comment: Information about the job position.

name: C200182
label: Job Position Identifier
comment: A unique number or alphanumeric code used to identify a job position.

name: C200183
label: Job Position Status
comment: Information defining the status of a job position.

name: C200184
label: K12 Charter School Authorizer Agency
comment: The relationship between a K12 Charter School and the Agency that authorized the school.

name: C200185
label: K12 Charter School Management Organization
comment: The relationship between a K12 Charter School and the organization that manages the school.

name: C200186
label: K12 Course
comment: The organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis, usually for a predetermined period of time (e.g., a semester or two-week workshop) to an individual or group of students (e.g., a class).

name: C200187
label: K12 Federal Fund Allocation
comment: Information about the type and amount of allocation of federal funds to a K12 organization during a funding period.

name: C200197
label: K12 Organization Student Responsibility
comment: K12OrganizationStudentResponsibility handles CEDS elements "Responsible School Type" and "Responsible District Type". Different organizations may be responsible for attendance, accountability, funding, IEP, and transportation for a single enrollment.

name: C200198
label: K12 Program Or Service
comment: Information on the programs and services offered by an LEA or school.

name: C200199
label: K12 School
comment: Information specific to K12 Schools. (Organization and related tables have properties that are common.)

name: C200200
label: K12 School Corrective Action
comment: The types of corrective actions utilized by a K12 school under ESEA as amended.

name: C200201
label: K12 School Improvement
comment: Information on the improvement status for a K12 school.

name: C200202
label: K12 School Indicator Status
comment: Information about a K-12 school's status that can be used to capture categories of accountability such as an indication of whether the school is identified by the state as amoung persistently lowest-achieving schools.

name: C200203
label: K12 School Status
comment: The collection of status values for a K12 school.

name: C200207
label: K12 Staff Assignment
comment: Describes a person's assignment to a K12 organization.

name: C200208
label: K12 Staff Employment
comment: Employment attributes for a K12 Staff Member.

name: C200209
label: K12 Student Academic Honor
comment: Academic distinctions earned or awarded to a K12 student.

name: C200210
label: K12 Student Academic Record
comment: The summary level academic record for a K12 student including graduation information.

name: C200211
label: K12 Student Activity
comment: Information linking a K12 student to activities they participate in.

name: C200212
label: K12 Student Cohort
comment: Information on the cohort for a K12 student.

name: C200213
label: K12 Student Course Section
comment: The attributes for a K12 student enrolled in a course section.

name: C200214
label: K12 Student Course Section Mark
comment: Defines information about a mark associated with a student for a course section, including flags to indicate if the mark is a final grade or a midterm grade.

name: C200215
label: K12 Student Discipline
comment: The detail information for the reason and action taken for a discipline event of a K12 student.

name: C200216
label: K12 Student Dropout
comment: Information about a student who has dropped out or potentially may have dropped out of a K12 school.

name: C200217
label: K12 Student Dropout Reason
comment: Information about the reason or reasons related to a student dropping out of a K12 school.

name: C200218
label: K12 Student Employment
comment: Employment information for a K12 Student.

name: C200219
label: K12 Student Enrollment
comment: Information about a student enrollment that is unique to the K12 context.

name: C200220
label: K12 Student Graduation Plan
comment: The plan of courses a K-12 student will take to graduate from high school.

name: C200221
label: K12 Student Home Language Survey
comment: Information captured on an English learner home language survey.

name: C200222
label: K12 Student Literacy Assessment
comment: Information about literacy assessment given to a K12 student.

name: C200223
label: K12 Student Session
comment: Information specific to a K12 student and session.

name: C200224
label: K12 Title III Language Instruction
comment: The collection of Title III language instructional programs offered by an LEA.

name: C200225
label: Learner Action
comment: LearnerAction is designed to handle clickstream data for online assessments and other experiences such as is used by intelligent tutoring systems. The model is compatible with the structure of data found in Experience API (xAPI) specification.

name: C200226
label: Learner Activity
comment: An entity with information about a learning activity that may be assigned to a learner, for example a homework assignment.

name: C200228
label: Learning Resource
comment: A persistent resource that has one or more physical or digital representations, and that explicitly involves, specifies or entails a learning activity or learning experience.

name: C200229
label: Learning Resource Adaptation
comment: Links a learning resource record to one or more available aptations based on this resource.

name: C200230
label: Learning Resource Identifier
comment: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to a learning resource by an organization.

name: C200231
label: Learning Resource Issued
comment: Information related to issuing a learning resource to a person for a period of time.

name: C200232
label: Learning Resource Media Feature
comment: Links a learning resource record to one or more media features.

name: C200233
label: Learning Resource Order
comment: Information related to an organization ordering or purchasing a learning resource.

name: C200234
label: Learning Resource Peer Rating
comment: Information about a rating given to a learning resource. (LearningResourceAggregatePeerRating  is a CEDS Connection to also support aggregate ratings.)

name: C200235
label: Learning Resource Physical Media
comment: Information about physical media on which the Learning Resource is delivered or available.

name: C200236
label: Learning Resource Status
comment: The current status of a learning resource owned or leased by an organization.

name: C200188
label: Local Education Agency
comment: An administrative unit within K-12 education at the local level which exists primarily to operate schools or to contract for educational services. These units may or may not be co-extensive with county, city, or town boundaries.

name: C200189
label: Local Education Agency Federal Funds
comment: Information on the federal funds received and distributed by the LEA under various programs.

name: C200190
label: Local Education Agency Federal Reporting
comment: Federal reporting status values and counts for an LEA.

name: C200191
label: Local Education Agency Policy
comment: Information related to policies within a K12 location education agency.

name: C200192
label: Local Education Agency PreK Eligibility
comment: The groups of students for whom pre-kindergarten is available.

name: C200193
label: Local Education Agency PreK Eligible Ages IDEA
comment: The ages of children not served under IDEA to whom the LEA's pre-kindergarten services are available.

name: C200194
label: Local Education Agency Safe Drug Free
comment: Information about the LEA's performance under the Safe and Drug-Free Schools and Communities act.

name: C200195
label: Local Education Agency Title III Professional Development
comment: The type of Title III professional development utilized by an LEA.

name: C200196
label: Local Education Agency Title I Support Service
comment: The type of support services provided to students in Title I programs by an LEA.

name: C200237
label: Location
comment: A location such as a physical address or mailing address.

name: C200238
label: Location Address
comment: Location that contains a address, city, state, zip.

name: C200257
label: Membership
comment: The association that represents a Person’s Role within an Organization for a period of time.

name: C200258
label: Membership Application
comment: Information related to a person applying for a specifing role in an organization (e.g., applying for college, applying to be enrolled in a program).

name: C200259
label: Membership Full Time Equivalency
comment: Information about the percentage of full-time equivalent work that a person contributes in a specific role for an organization.

name: C200260
label: Membership Relationship
comment: The relationship between two Membership records.

name: C001756
label: O* NET- SOC Occupation Type
comment: The O*NET-SOC taxonomy defines the set of occupations across the world of work based on the Standard Occupational Classification.

name: C200239
label: Organization
comment: An entity that represents any type of organization.  It includes information common to all types of organizations.  CEDS also defines specific types of organizations such as Early Learning Organization, K12 School and Post Secondary Institution.

name: C200240
label: Organization Accreditation
comment: The accreditation status of an organization and accreditation agency.

name: C200241
label: Organization Calendar
comment: OrganizationCalendar represents a calendar owned by an Organization. The details of the calendar are defined by OrganizationCalendarEvent, OrganizationCalendarDay, OrganizationCalendarSession, and OrganizationCalendarCrisis.

name: C200242
label: Organization Calendar Crisis
comment: OrganizationCalendarCrisis provides the unschehduled exceptions to the  calendar such as a natural disaster, that causes closing of a school or the displacement of students from a school or institution over multiple days, weeks or months.

name: C200243
label: Organization Calendar Day
comment: OrganzationCalendarDay is for naming days within the regular schedule.

name: C200244
label: Organization Calendar Event
comment: OrganizationCalendarEvent handles scheduled or unscheduled events such as holidays or closings that may interrupt the course section schedule on a specified date. See CEDS element definition and option set for Calendar Event Type.

name: C200245
label: Organization Calendar Session
comment: OrganizationCalendarSession provides the beginning and end date of the period of time, such as a term or semester. It has multiple uses. For example, it may be flagged as an "attendance term" with a value for DaysInSession, or the specific days applicable for attendance may be derived using OrganizationCalendarEvent. Early learning use cases use this entity to specify instructional session start and end times within the context of a day.

name: C200247
label: Organization Email
comment: An email address for an organization.

name: C200248
label: Organization Employee Benefit
comment: Information about employee benefits linked to an organization.

name: C200249
label: Organization Enrollment Capacity
comment: Information about the capacity for an enrollment in an organization such as school, program, or course.

name: C200250
label: Organization Federal Accountability
comment: Information on the status of the organization on various federal accountability measures.

name: C200251
label: Organization Financial
comment: The intersection of FinancialAccount and OrganizationCalendarSession (representing an AccountingPeriod) and containing the values for that accounting period.

name: C200252
label: Organization Identifier
comment: A unique number or alphanumeric code assigned to an organization by a school, school system, a state, or other agency or entity.

name: C200253
label: Organization Image
comment: An photo linked to an organization.

name: C200254
label: Organization Indicator
comment: Describes any sort of indicator/metric/measure that is tracked at the organization level

name: C200255
label: Organization Jurisdiction
comment: Information related to the jurisdiction of an organization.

name: C200246
label: Organization Name
comment: Information about an organization.

name: C200256
label: Organization Operational Status
comment: The classification of the operational condition of an organization.

name: C200261
label: Organization Policy
comment: Organizational policies. Examples would include Immunization Policy, Referral Policy, Language Translation Policy, Employee Policy.

name: C200262
label: Organization Population Served
comment: Aggregate information related to persons being served by an organization.

name: C200263
label: Organization Program Type
comment: The instructional or non-instructional programs, activities and procedures designed to accomplish a predetermined educational objective or set of objectives or to provide support services to person and/or the community.

name: C200264
label: Organization Project Based Learning
comment: Information related to project bassed learning offered by an organization.

name: C200265
label: Organization Relationship
comment: The relationship of one organization to another.

name: C200266
label: Organization Salary Schedule Criteria
comment: Criteria defined by an organization used to determine a salary schedule.

name: C200267
label: Organization Salary Schedule Criteria Value
comment: The possible values associated with the criteria.

name: C200268
label: Organization Salary Schedule Criteria Value Salary
comment: The relationship between the salary schedule criteria value and the salary schedule salary value.

name: C200269
label: Organization Salary Schedule Salary
comment: The salary for the salary schedule and if relevant any occupation related classifications.

name: C200270
label: Organization Service
comment: Information about the types of services offered by an organization.

name: C200271
label: Organization Technical Assistance
comment: Indicates the types of technical assistance being deliverd to an organization such as a provider of early learning services.

name: C200273
label: Organization Website
comment: The website URL for an organization.

name: C200274
label: Peer Rating System
comment: The peer rating / scaling system used to rate a Learning Resource.

name: C200275
label: Person
comment: A person, including Students, Staff and Parents.

name: C200276
label: Person Address Nces Side
comment: Information related to the National Center for Education Statistics (NCES) spatially interpolated demographic estimate (SIDE) based on the address latitude and longitude location.

name: C200277
label: Person Allergy
comment: An alergy type associated with a person.

name: C200376
label: Person Birth
comment: Information related to the birth of a person

name: C200278
label: Person Birthplace
comment: The city, state, and country where a person was born.

name: C200279
label: Person Career Education Plan
comment: Information about a career education plan for a person.

name: C200014
label: Person Citizenship
comment: Information about the citizenship status of a person

name: C200280
label: Person Credential
comment: The credential awarded to a person.

name: C200281
label: Person Degree Or Certificate
comment: The name of the degree or certificate earned by an individual. This includes honorary degrees conferred upon an individual.

name: C200282
label: Person Demographic Race
comment: The associations of a person to a race.  Multiple associations are allowed.

name: C200283
label: Person Digital Access
comment: Information related to digitial accessiblity for a person.

name: C200284
label: Person Digital Access Speed
comment: Information related to the speed of digital access for a person.

name: C200285
label: Person Disability
comment: The disability status for an individual and their primary disability.

name: C200286
label: Person Email Address
comment: The electronic mail (e-mail) address for a person.

name: C200287
label: Person Family
comment: The attributes of a person's family.

name: C200288
label: Person Health
comment: Data points of a person's health

name: C200289
label: Person Health Birth
comment: Data points of a person's health and status at time of birth.

name: C200290
label: Person Homelessness
comment: Persons who lack a fixed, regular, and adequate nighttime residence.

name: C200291
label: Person Identifier
comment: Identifiers assigned to an individual.

name: C200292
label: Person Immunization
comment: The immunizations that a person has satisfactorily received.

name: C200293
label: Person Language
comment: Languages that a person uses to communicate.

name: C200294
label: Person Learning Device
comment: Information related to learning devices used by a person.

name: C200295
label: Person Master
comment: A table used to link a Person records that represent the same person but may be from different sources and may reflect differences in details.

name: C200296
label: Person Military
comment: Information about a person's connections to the military.

name: C200297
label: Person Military Campaigns
comment: Information related to a military campaign in which the person has been involved during the service period.

name: C200298
label: Person Military Deployment
comment: Information related to military deployment for a person.

name: C200299
label: Person Military Duties
comment: Information related to duties encompassed within a period of military service.

name: C200300
label: Person Military Expertise
comment: Information related to expertise that the person developed during the service period.

name: C200301
label: Person Military Honors
comment: Information related to a military honor that the person received during the service period.

name: C200302
label: Person Military Occupational Specialties
comment: Information related to a military occupational specialty of a person.

name: C200303
label: Person Military Service Locations
comment: Information related to the duty stations (locations) encompassed within a period of military service.

name: C200377
label: Person Name
comment: Information related to the legal name of a person

name: C200304
label: Person Other Name
comment: Other names or aliases for a person.

name: C200305
label: Person Personal Information Verification
comment: Information related to the type of personal information used (e.g., Birth Certificate) and for what purpose.

name: C200306
label: Person Program Participation
comment: Information about a person's participation in a program.

name: C200307
label: Person Referral
comment: Information about a person being reffered for evaluation, such as a student being reffered for evaluation for elligibility to receive services under IDEA.

name: C200308
label: Person Relationship
comment: Identifies two people and the nature of their relationship.

name: C200378
label: Person Residency
comment: Information related to the residency status of a person

name: C200011
label: Person Sex Gender
comment: Information about the sex or gender of a person

name: C200309
label: Person Status
comment: Identifies a status (yes/no) for a person for a status type.

name: C200310
label: Person Transportation Eligibility
comment: Information related to the eligibility of a person to be transported using public funds.

name: C200328
label: Postsecondary Course
comment: The organization of subject matter and related learning experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis, usually for a predetermined period of time (e.g., a semester or two-week workshop) to an individual or group of students (e.g., a class).

name: C200329
label: Postsecondary Institution
comment: An organization that provides educational programs for individuals who have completed or otherwise left educational programs in secondary school(s).

name: C200330
label: Postsecondary Price Of Attendance
comment: The price of attendance data for a postsecondary institution and a given session.

name: C200331
label: Postsecondary Program
comment: The attributes for a postsecondary program that define the type program, the program length, and other requirements for a degree or certificate.

name: C200332
label: Postsecondary Section
comment: Information specific to a postsecondary course section as an extension of CourseSection.

name: C200333
label: Postsecondary Section Location
comment: Information about a location in which a postsecondary course section is delivered.

name: C200334
label: Postsecondary Staff Employment
comment: Attributes for postsecondary staff employment. Extends from Staff.

name: C200335
label: Postsecondary Student Academic Award
comment: An award conferred by a college, university, or other postsecondary education institution as official recognition for the successful completion of a program of study.

name: C200336
label: Postsecondary Student Academic Record
comment: The summary level academic record for a postsecondary student including graduation information.

name: C200337
label: Postsecondary Student Admission Test
comment: A student's performance on a test prepared and administered by an agency that is independent of any postsecondary education institution and is typically used for admissions purposes.

name: C200338
label: Postsecondary Student Application
comment: Information on an individual who submits an application for admission to a postsecondary institution.

name: C200339
label: Postsecondary Student Cohort
comment: Information about a cohort of postsecndary students.

name: C200340
label: Postsecondary Student Course Section Mark
comment: Marks in a gradebook for a student's participation in a postescondary course.

name: C200341
label: Postsecondary Student Demographic
comment: Additional attributes for a postsecondary student (beyond those demographic attributes stored in PersonDemographic)

name: C200342
label: Postsecondary Student Employment
comment: Employment information for a postsecondary student.

name: C200343
label: Postsecondary Student Enrollment
comment: Attributes of a person enrolled at a postsecondary institution.

name: C200344
label: Postsecondary Student Financial Aid
comment: Information on a person who applies for financial aid to participate in postsecondary education.

name: C200345
label: Postsecondary Student Program
comment: The classification of a program of a postsecondary student.

name: C200346
label: Postsecondary Student Section
comment: A postsecondary student's performance in a class/section.

name: C200070
label: Postsecondary System
comment: A network of peer-level educational organizations intended to provide shared services or collective procurement.

name: C200311
label: Professional Development Activity
comment: An activity designed for the purpose of developing someone professionally.

name: C200312
label: Professional Development Requirement
comment: Information about a requirement that a person participate in professional development related to a specific professional role or assignment.

name: C200313
label: Professional Development Session
comment: Information about part or all of a Professional Development Activity scheduled for delivery within a single day.

name: C200314
label: Professional Development Session Instructor
comment: Information about an instructor assigned to a ProfessionalDevelopmentSession.

name: C200382
label: Professional Membership Organization
comment: An association or corporation established for the purpose of providing services on a nonprofit basis to its members.

name: C200315
label: Program
comment: A system of services, opportunities, or projects, designed to meet academic or non-academic needs.

name: C001922
label: Program Entry Reason
comment: The documented or assumed reason a person is being served by a program.

name: C200316
label: Program Participation Adult Education
comment: Information on a person participating in an adult education program.

name: C200317
label: Program Participation Attainment
comment: Information related to outcomes in a program.

name: C200318
label: Program Participation Career And Technical
comment: Information on a person participating in a career and technical education program.

name: C200319
label: Program Participation Food Service
comment: Information on a person participating in a food service program.

name: C200320
label: Program Participation Migrant
comment: Information on a person participating in a migrant student education program.

name: C200321
label: Program Participation Neglected
comment: Information on a person participating in a neglected or delinquent student education program.

name: C200322
label: Program Participation Special Education
comment: Information on a person participating in a special education program.

name: C200323
label: Program Participation Teacher Prep
comment: Information on a person participating in a teacher preparation education program.

name: C200324
label: Program Participation Title I
comment: Information on a person participating in a Title I education program.

name: C200325
label: Program Participation Title III English Learner
comment: Information on a person participating in a Title III limited English proficiency education program.

name: C200326
label: Program Participation WIOA
comment: Information related to participation in workforce programs through the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA).

name: C200327
label: Program Participation WIOA Barriers
comment: Information related to barries to employment for a person who participated in programs through the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA).

name: C200347
label: Quarterly Employment Record
comment: Person-level employment and earnings information from quarterly employment and earnings-related data from sources such as State UI Wage Records, the Wage Record Interchange System, or the Federal Employment Data Exchange System (FEDES).

name: C200381
label: Recruiter
comment: An organization responsible for identifying and/or selecting prospective employees to fill vacant positions in an organization.

name: C200394
label: Region
comment: An area or other organizational construct that is identified by defined characteristics and is typically used to group other related organizations.

name: C200348
label: Required Immunization
comment: Immunizations required by an organization or governing body.

name: C200349
label: Role
comment: The list of roles for a person.

name: C200350
label: Role Attendance
comment: Aggregated attendance counts.

name: C200351
label: Role Attendance Event
comment: The attributes of a person's attendance during a given day.

name: C200352
label: Role Status
comment: RoleStatus supports cases such as when a student “applied” for enrollment in a Course Section, Program, or School/Institution, was “accepted,” and then was “enrolled.” Each status may have different begin and end dates.

name: C200353
label: Rubric
comment: A set of criteria or indicators that assist in determining whether an entity possesses a given competence or level of performance in a task or work product.

name: C200354
label: Rubric Criterion
comment: A single criterion by which one aspect of an entity’s competence may be evaluated.

name: C200355
label: Rubric Criterion Level
comment: A degree or level of competence.

name: C200356
label: Service Frequency
comment: Information about the schedule and frequency by which services are planned to be deliverd.

name: C200357
label: Service Plan
comment: A plan to provide services to a person, group, or a person's family, such as services delivered under Individualized Education Programs or Individualized Family Services Plans.

name: C200358
label: Service Provided
comment: Services available from an organization or person that may be linked ServicePlan and ServicesRecieved information.

name: C200359
label: Service Provider
comment: A subclass of organization that links the organization to a set of services it provides.

name: C200359
label: Service Provider
comment: An organization responsible for administering services to an individual or organization participating in a program or receiving services.

name: C200360
label: Services Received
comment: Information about services received such as services received by a student. May link individual services received to a service plan.

name: C200361
label: Service Staff
comment: Relationship to the person-role that provided the service.

name: C200018
label: SHEEO Agency
comment: An entity tasked with overseeing higher education in its state and is led by a state higher education executive officer.

name: C200362
label: Staff Compensation
comment: Information related to the compensation of staff members.

name: C200363
label: Staff Compensation Funding Source
comment: The relationship between the staff compensation and the financial account used for the compensation.

name: C200364
label: Staff Credential
comment: A credential held by a staff member.

name: C200380
label: Staff Development Provider
comment: An individual or organization who provides a planned, structured process through which an individual improves his or her job-related knowledge, skills, or attitudes. Such a process is deigned to enable a staff member to grow within a profession or organization or to attain an initial or additional credential.

name: C200365
label: Staff Employment
comment: Information on employment of a person by an organization.

name: C200366
label: Staff Evaluation
comment: Evaluation of a staff member's performance.

name: C200367
label: Staff Evaluation Part
comment: Information about the score and sections of a staff evaluation assessment.

name: C200368
label: Staff Experience
comment: Number of years of experience for a staff member.

name: C200369
label: Staff Professional Development Activity
comment: Information about a person's participation in a professional development activity and outcomes from that participation that may be related to a Professional Development Requirement and one or more Professional Development Sessions.

name: C200370
label: Staff Technical Assistance
comment: Information about technical assitance provided to staff and type of assitance.

name: C000730
label: Standard Occupational Classification
comment: A Bureau of Labor Statistics coding system for classifying occupations by work performed and, in some cases, on the skills, education and training needed to perform the work at a competent level.  See https://www.bls.gov/soc/2018/major_groups.htm.

name: C200204
label: State Education Agency
comment: The SEA is the state-level entity primarily responsible for the supervision of the state's public elementary and secondary schools.

name: C200205
label: State Education Agency Alternate Fund Use
comment: Purposes that funds available under ESEA section 6111 (Grants for State Assessments and Related Activities) were used for purposes other than the costs of the development of the State assessments and standards required by section 1111(b).

name: C200206
label: State Education Agency Federal Funds
comment: Information on the federal funds received by the SEA.

name: C200371
label: Teacher Education Credential Exam
comment: The exam and score of a person on a teaching credential exam.

name: C000774
label: Teacher Education Credential Exam Score Type
comment: An indication of the type of credential exam associated with a given exam score.

name: C200372
label: Teacher Student Data Link Exclusion
comment: Indicates that the student is excluded from calculation of value-added or growth attribution calculations used for teacher evaluation.

name: C200272
label: Telephone
comment: A telephone number for a person or an organization.

name: C200373
label: Workforce Employment Quarterly Data
comment: Person-level employment and earnings information from quarterly employment and earnings-related data from sources such as State UI Wage Records, the Wage Record Interchange System, or the Federal Employment Data Exchange System (FEDES).

name: C200374
label: Workforce Program Participant Cohort
comment: Information about a specific cohort of workforce program participants.

name: C200375
label: Workforce Program Participation
comment: Information about instruction and/or services provided to a person through a workforce and/or an employment development program.
